observation_text: Your details are rather vague, but it would appear to us that there are two transmissions in question. So far as we know, there was no relay of any speeches in English by a French station on that date, and there is a possibility of your having picked up a transmission from KDKA (East Pittsburgh). When you moved your condenser, you probably heard the PTT Marseilles call.
